actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing.

official_title: A bill to prohibit the Federal Home Loan Bank Board from permitting Federal savings and loan associations to make home mortgage loans with variable interest rates except in special circumstances.

summary.text: Prohibits the Federal Home Loan Bank Board from permitting Federal savings and loan associations to make home mortgage loans with varible interest rates except where authorized by State law or where the terms of such satisfy specified requirements.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the Federal Home Loan Bank Board from permitting Federal savings and loan associations to make home mortgage loans with variable interest rates except in special circumstances.
